{"step_by_step_thinking": "To determine which of the options is not used in preterm labor to decrease uterine contractility, we need to evaluate the pharmacological properties of each option.

C. Magnesium sulphate: Magnesium sulphate is a tocolytic agent that is frequently used to decrease uterine contractility in preterm labor.
